title: （全球文宣）開始係世界各地帶起輿論制裁支那有無得諗？

replies.msg:
你一開波就話出兵打仗都得既，總之就開始扮下人她國民煽動下仇中情緒，當然情況許可以講埋「香港、台灣應該支持」等大家有共識 hk is not Chi-na

希望唔會沉啦個post

唔好亂黎
好易睇得出你係 外國人
好似Reddit 個班偽外國人 一起底同啲英文文法
就知係扮外國人
我係當地人會屌鳩你先
整個聯署支持各國出兵

well, I think many countries like us and italy have the intention to do that.
but I'm not sure about how the citizens think, so maybe we can have few steps.

1. promote the the orgin of virus is from china and the WHO is corrupted by China, that's why the world couldn't take action ( which is very successful now in my opinion)

2. many mainlanders they bought all the masks and all, so I think we can spin the focus of lacking of resources to China. since china had massively purchased the materials eg Australia .

3. China is trying to spin the focus, so she is trying to offer the materials such as masks and testing kit, but those were in poor quality. and they claim to the world that they donate, but in fact they were selling it.

4. ask people's opinions if China should bear the accountability, by offering the evidences.

5. then officially promote to the world that China should compensate.

* its not very detailed, but I think should be step by step, now we're at step 2 to 3.

feel free to make amendments or change to Chinese. cause idk how to type in Chinese.
支國人周圍搞事 唔洗特登扮外國人都得

唔好急
未咁快
等班五毛加速多一陣先
